summary.para: Determines the how the current property is indexed.

param.name: ppdciType
param.para: When this method returns successfully, contains a pointer to a constant. This constant describes whether the property is indexed and if so, if it is indexed in memory or on disk.

summary.para: Exposes search-related information for a property. The information provided by this interface comes from the propertyDescription schema, searchInfo element for a given property.
